Name: Disable-PhysicalDiskIndication
Synopsis: Turns off the identification LED on the specified physical disk.

Name: Disable-StorageDiagnosticLog
Synopsis: Stops a Storage diagnostic log.

Name: Enable-PhysicalDiskIndication
Synopsis: Enables the identification LED on the specified physical disk.

Name: Enable-StorageDiagnosticLog
Synopsis: Starts Storage diagnostic logging.

Name: Flush-Volume
Synopsis: Writes the file system cache to disk.

Name: Get-DiskSNV
Synopsis: Gets the view of a disk from a storage node.

Name: Get-PhysicalDiskSNV
Synopsis: Gets the node view of a physical disk.

Name: Get-StorageEnclosureSNV
Synopsis: Gets the node view of a Storage enclosure.

Name: Initialize-Volume
Synopsis: Formats one or more existing volumes or a new volume on an existing partition.

Name: Write-FileSystemCache
Synopsis: Writes the file system cache to disk.

Name: Add-InitiatorIdToMaskingSet
Synopsis: Adds an initiator ID to an existing masking set, granting the host associated with the initiator ID access to the virtual disk and target port resources defined in the masking set.

Name: Add-PartitionAccessPath
Synopsis: Adds an access path such as a drive letter or folder to a partition.

Name: Add-PhysicalDisk
Synopsis: Adds a physical disk to the specified storage pool or manually assigns a physical disk to a specific virtual disk.

Name: Add-StorageFaultDomain
Synopsis:
Add-StorageFaultDomain [-VirtualDisk] <CimInstance#MSFT_VirtualDisk> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Add-StorageFaultDomain -VirtualDiskFriendlyName <string> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Add-StorageFaultDomain -VirtualDiskName <string> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Add-StorageFaultDomain -VirtualDiskUniqueId <string> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Add-StorageFaultDomain [-StorageTier] <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageTier> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Add-StorageFaultDomain -StorageTierFriendlyName <string> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Add-StorageFaultDomain -StorageTierUniqueId <string> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Add-TargetPortToMaskingSet
Synopsis: Adds one or more target ports to a specified masking set, allowing a connection between the target ports, and any virtual disks and initiator IDs that the masking set contains.

Name: Add-VirtualDiskToMaskingSet
Synopsis: Adds a virtual disk to a specified masking set and grants access to the virtual disk to all initiator IDs defined in the masking set.

Name: Block-FileShareAccess
Synopsis: Blocks access to a file share.

Name: Clear-Disk
Synopsis: Cleans a disk by removing all partition information and un-initializing it, erasing all data on the disk.

Name: Clear-FileStorageTier
Synopsis: Unpins a file from the specified storage tier.

Name: Connect-VirtualDisk
Synopsis: Connects a disconnected virtual disk to the specified computer when using the Windows Storage subsystem.

Name: Debug-FileShare
Synopsis: Finds problems with a file share and recommends solutions.

Name: Debug-StorageSubSystem
Synopsis: Finds problems with a storage subsystem and recommends solutions.

Name: Debug-Volume
Synopsis: Finds problems with a volume and recommends solutions.

Name: Disable-PhysicalDiskIdentification
Synopsis: Turns off the identification LED on the specified physical disk.

Name: Disable-StorageEnclosureIdentification
Synopsis: Turns off the identification LED on a storage enclosure or the slots for individual disks.

Name: Disable-StorageHighAvailability
Synopsis: Disables a Storage resource.

Name: Disable-StorageMaintenanceMode
Synopsis: Disables storage maintenance mode on a fault domain.

Name: Disconnect-VirtualDisk
Synopsis: Disconnects a virtual disk from the specified computer, revoking access to the virtual disk.

Name: Dismount-DiskImage
Synopsis: Dismounts a disk image (virtual hard disk or ISO) so that it can no longer be accessed as a disk.

Name: Enable-PhysicalDiskIdentification
Synopsis: Enables the identification LED on the specified physical disk.

Name: Enable-StorageEnclosureIdentification
Synopsis: Enables the identification LED on a storage enclosure or the slots for individual disks.

Name: Enable-StorageHighAvailability
Synopsis: Enables a disk to be added to the failover cluster.

Name: Enable-StorageMaintenanceMode
Synopsis: Enables storage maintenance mode on a device.

Name: Format-Volume
Synopsis: Formats one or more existing volumes or a new volume on an existing partition.

Name: Get-DedupProperties
Synopsis: Gets Data Deduplication information.

Name: Get-Disk
Synopsis: Gets one or more disks visible to the operating system.

Name: Get-DiskImage
Synopsis: Gets one or more disk image objects (virtual hard disk or ISO).

Name: Get-DiskStorageNodeView
Synopsis: Gets the view of a disk from a storage node.

Name: Get-FileIntegrity
Synopsis: Gets integrity information for a file on an ReFS volume.

Name: Get-FileShare
Synopsis: Retrieves file share objects and their properties.

Name: Get-FileShareAccessControlEntry
Synopsis: Retrieves an access control entry for the share corresponding to a single account.

Name: Get-FileStorageTier
Synopsis: Gets the files assigned to a Storage tier on a volume, and their status.

Name: Get-InitiatorId
Synopsis: Gets the InitiatorID objects for the specified iSCSI initiators.

Name: Get-InitiatorPort
Synopsis: Gets one or more host bus adapter (HBA) initiator ports.

Name: Get-MaskingSet
Synopsis: Gets masking sets. Masking sets are used to grant access to a virtual disk or iSCSI VHD for one or more servers.

Name: Get-OffloadDataTransferSetting
Synopsis: Returns offloaded data transfer (ODX) settings for the specified subsystem.

Name: Get-Partition
Synopsis: Returns a list of all partition objects visible on all disks, or optionally a filtered list using specified parameters.

Name: Get-PartitionSupportedSize
Synopsis: Returns information on supported partition sizes for the specified Disk object.

Name: Get-PhysicalDisk
Synopsis: Gets a list of all PhysicalDisk objects visible across any available Storage Management Providers, or optionally a filtered list.

Name: Get-PhysicalDiskStorageNodeView
Synopsis: Gets the node view of a physical disk.

Name: Get-PhysicalExtent
Synopsis: Gets physical allocations for a physical disk, storage tier, or virtual disk.

Name: Get-PhysicalExtentAssociation
Synopsis: Gets the physical disk, storage tier, or virtual disk that is associated with a physical extent.

Name: Get-ResiliencySetting
Synopsis: Gets the resiliency settings (also known as storage layouts) available for creating virtual disks on the specified storage subsystem.

Name: Get-StorageAdvancedProperty
Synopsis: Gets the advanced properties on a storage device.

Name: Get-StorageChassis
Synopsis:
Get-StorageChassis [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-StorageChassis -StorageSubsystem <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageSubsystem> [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-StorageChassis -StorageFaultDomain <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain> [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-StorageDiagnosticInfo
Synopsis: Gets Storage diagnostic information.

Name: Get-StorageEnclosure
Synopsis: Gets storage enclosures.

Name: Get-StorageEnclosureStorageNodeView
Synopsis: Gets the node view of a Storage enclosure.

Name: Get-StorageEnclosureVendorData
Synopsis: Gets vendor-specific data for an enclosure.

Name: Get-StorageExtendedStatus
Synopsis: Get-StorageExtendedStatus -StorageJob <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageJob> [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-StorageFaultDomain
Synopsis: Gets a Storage fault domain object.

Name: Get-StorageFileServer
Synopsis: Gets a storage file server.

Name: Get-StorageFirmwareInformation
Synopsis: Gets information about firmware on a storage object.

Name: Get-StorageHealthAction
Synopsis: Gets health-related system activities.

Name: Get-StorageHealthReport
Synopsis: Gets a storage health report.

Name: Get-StorageHealthSetting
Synopsis: Gets storage health service settings.

Name: Get-StorageHistory
Synopsis:
Get-StorageHistory -PhysicalDisk <CimInstance#MSFT_PhysicalDisk> [-Credential <pscredential>] [-LogFile <string>] [-NumberOfHours <uint32>] [-Disaggregate] [-Errors] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-StorageHistory -DeviceGuid <string> [-LogFile <string>] [-NumberOfHours <uint32>] [-Disaggregate] [-Errors] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-StorageHistory -DeviceNumber <string> [-LogFile <string>] [-NumberOfHours <uint32>] [-Disaggregate] [-Errors] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-StorageJob
Synopsis: Returns information about long-running Storage module jobs, such as a repair task.

Name: Get-StorageNode
Synopsis: Gets storage nodes.

Name: Get-StoragePool
Synopsis: Gets a specific storage pool, or a set of StoragePool objects either from all storage subsystems across all storage providers, or optionally a filtered subset based on specific parameters.

Name: Get-StorageProvider
Synopsis: Returns a list of the storage providers available on the local computer.

Name: Get-StorageRack
Synopsis:
Get-StorageRack [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-StorageRack -StorageSubsystem <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageSubsystem> [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-StorageRack -StorageFaultDomain <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain> [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-StorageReliabilityCounter
Synopsis: Gets storage reliability counters.

Name: Get-StorageScaleUnit
Synopsis:
Get-StorageScaleUnit [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-StorageScaleUnit -StorageSubsystem <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageSubsystem> [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-StorageScaleUnit -StorageFaultDomain <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain> [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-StorageSetting
Synopsis: Gets a StorageSettings object.

Name: Get-StorageSite
Synopsis:
Get-StorageSite [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-StorageSite -StorageSubsystem <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageSubsystem> [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-StorageSite -StorageFaultDomain <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain> [-FriendlyName <string>] [-SerialNumber <string>] [-PhysicalLocation <string>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-StorageSubSystem
Synopsis: Gets one or more StorageSubsystem objects.

Name: Get-StorageTier
Synopsis: Gets storage tiers on Windows Storage subsystems.

Name: Get-StorageTierSupportedSize
Synopsis: Gets the minimum and maximum possible sizes of a storage tier.

Name: Get-SupportedClusterSizes
Synopsis: Gets the supported cluster sizes.

Name: Get-SupportedFileSystems
Synopsis: Gets the file system choices for a specified volume.

Name: Get-TargetPort
Synopsis: Returns a TargetPort object associated with a specific port address and connection type.

Name: Get-TargetPortal
Synopsis: Returns a TargetPortal object.

Name: Get-VirtualDisk
Synopsis: Returns a list of VirtualDisk objects, across all storage pools, across all providers, or optionally a filtered subset based on provided criteria.

Name: Get-VirtualDiskSupportedSize
Synopsis: Returns all sizes supported by a storage pool for virtual disk creation based on the specified resiliency setting name.

Name: Get-Volume
Synopsis: Gets the specified Volume object, or all Volume objects if no filter is provided.

Name: Get-VolumeCorruptionCount
Synopsis: Gets a count of the file system errors on the NTFS volume.

Name: Get-VolumeScrubPolicy
Synopsis: Gets the status of the volume scrub policy.

Name: Grant-FileShareAccess
Synopsis: Grants access to a file share.

Name: Hide-VirtualDisk
Synopsis: Hides the virtual disk from the host when the Storage Management Provider in use does not support masking sets.

Name: Initialize-Disk
Synopsis: Initializes a RAW disk for first time use, enabling the disk to be formatted and used to store data.

Name: Mount-DiskImage
Synopsis: Mounts a previously created disk image (virtual hard disk or ISO), making it appear as a normal disk.

Name: New-FileShare
Synopsis: Creates an access point for a remote file share.

Name: New-MaskingSet
Synopsis: Creates a new masking set.

Name: New-Partition
Synopsis: Creates a new partition on an existing Disk object.

Name: New-StorageFileServer
Synopsis: Creates a storage file server.

Name: New-StoragePool
Synopsis: Creates a new storage pool using a group of physical disks.

Name: New-StorageSubsystemVirtualDisk
Synopsis: Allows the creation of a VirtualDisk object on a storage subsystem that does not support creation of storage pools.

Name: New-StorageTier
Synopsis: Creates a storage tier.

Name: New-VirtualDisk
Synopsis: Creates a new virtual disk in the specified storage pool.

Name: New-VirtualDiskClone
Synopsis: Creates a new clone of a specified virtual disk.

Name: New-VirtualDiskSnapshot
Synopsis: Creates a new snapshot of the specified virtual disk.

Name: New-Volume
Synopsis: Creates a volume with the specified file system.

Name: Optimize-StoragePool
Synopsis: Optimizes a Storage pool.

Name: Optimize-Volume
Synopsis: Optimizes a volume.

Name: Register-StorageSubsystem
Synopsis: Connects to storage subsystems on a remote computer.

Name: Remove-FileShare
Synopsis: Removes a file share.

Name: Remove-InitiatorId
Synopsis: Removes an initiator identifier (ID).

Name: Remove-InitiatorIdFromMaskingSet
Synopsis: Removes an initiator identifier (ID) from a masking set.

Name: Remove-MaskingSet
Synopsis: Removes a masking set.

Name: Remove-Partition
Synopsis: Deletes the specified Partition object on an existing disk and any underlying Volume objects.

Name: Remove-PartitionAccessPath
Synopsis: Removes an access path such as a drive letter or folder from a partition.

Name: Remove-PhysicalDisk
Synopsis: Removes a physical disk from a specified storage pool.

Name: Remove-StorageFaultDomain
Synopsis:
Remove-StorageFaultDomain [-VirtualDisk] <CimInstance#MSFT_VirtualDisk> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Remove-StorageFaultDomain -VirtualDiskFriendlyName <string> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Remove-StorageFaultDomain -VirtualDiskName <string> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Remove-StorageFaultDomain -VirtualDiskUniqueId <string> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Remove-StorageFaultDomain [-StorageTier] <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageTier> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Remove-StorageFaultDomain -StorageTierFriendlyName <string> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Remove-StorageFaultDomain -StorageTierUniqueId <string> [-StorageFaultDomains <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageFaultDomain[]>] [-StorageFaultDomainFriendlyNames <string[]>] [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Remove-StorageFileServer
Synopsis: Removes a file server.

Name: Remove-StorageHealthIntent
Synopsis: Remove-StorageHealthIntent -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_StorageObject> [-CimSession <CimSession>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Remove-StorageHealthSetting
Synopsis: Removes a storage health service setting.

Name: Remove-StoragePool
Synopsis: Deletes a storage pool and associated VirtualDisk objects.

Name: Remove-StorageTier
Synopsis: Removes storage tiers from a storage pool.

Name: Remove-TargetPortFromMaskingSet
Synopsis: Removes a specified target port from a masking set.

Name: Remove-VirtualDisk
Synopsis: Deletes an existing virtual disk and reclaims the used space for use by other virtual disks in the same storage pool.

Name: Remove-VirtualDiskFromMaskingSet
Synopsis: Removes a virtual disk from a specified masking set to block access to the virtual disk by an InitiatorIds object defined in the masking set.

Name: Rename-MaskingSet
Synopsis: Renames an existing masking set.

Name: Repair-FileIntegrity
Synopsis: Repairs a corrupted file on an NTFS or ReFS volume.

Name: Repair-VirtualDisk
Synopsis: Performs repairs on a virtual disk that is unhealthy.

Name: Repair-Volume
Synopsis: Performs repairs on a volume.

Name: Reset-PhysicalDisk
Synopsis: Resets the status of a physical disk.

Name: Reset-StorageReliabilityCounter
Synopsis: Resets storage reliability counters for a disk.

Name: Resize-Partition
Synopsis: Resizes a partition and the underlying file system.

Name: Resize-StorageTier
Synopsis: Increases the size of storage tiers.

Name: Resize-VirtualDisk
Synopsis: Resizes an existing virtual disk to be larger or smaller.

Name: Revoke-FileShareAccess
Synopsis: Revokes access to a file share.

Name: Set-Disk
Synopsis: Takes a Disk object or unique disk identifiers and a set of attributes, and updates the physical disk on the system.

Name: Set-FileIntegrity
Synopsis: Sets integrity for a file on an ReFS volume.

Name: Set-FileShare
Synopsis: Modifies a file share.

Name: Set-FileStorageTier
Synopsis: Assigns a file to a storage tier.

Name: Set-InitiatorPort
Synopsis: Sets properties on the InitiatorPort object.

Name: Set-Partition
Synopsis: Sets attributes of a partition, such as active, read-only, and offline states.

Name: Set-PhysicalDisk
Synopsis: Sets attributes on a specific physical disk.

Name: Set-ResiliencySetting
Synopsis: Modifies the properties of the specified resiliency setting name.

Name: Set-StorageFileServer
Synopsis: Modifies a storage file server.

Name: Set-StorageHealthSetting
Synopsis: Modifies a storage health service setting.

Name: Set-StoragePool
Synopsis: Modifies the properties of the specified storage pool.

Name: Set-StorageProvider
Synopsis: Modifies whether to enable the SMP provider cache.

Name: Set-StorageSetting
Synopsis: Adjusts or configures current storage settings of the StorageSetting object.

Name: Set-StorageSubSystem
Synopsis: Modifies the properties of a StorageSubsystem object.

Name: Set-StorageTier
Synopsis: Modifies a storage tier.

Name: Set-VirtualDisk
Synopsis: Modifies the attributes of an existing virtual disk.

Name: Set-Volume
Synopsis: Sets or changes the file system label of an existing volume.

Name: Set-VolumeScrubPolicy
Synopsis: Sets the status of the volume scrub policy.

Name: Show-StorageHistory
Synopsis: Show-StorageHistory [-Objects] <ArrayList> [-Title <string>] [-DisplayAvgLatency] [-DisplayMaxLatency] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Show-VirtualDisk
Synopsis: Makes a virtual disk available to a host.

Name: Start-StorageDiagnosticLog
Synopsis: Starts Storage diagnostic logging.

Name: Stop-StorageDiagnosticLog
Synopsis: Stops a Storage diagnostic log.

Name: Stop-StorageJob
Synopsis: Stops storage job.

Name: Unblock-FileShareAccess
Synopsis: Unblocks access to a file share.

Name: Unregister-StorageSubsystem
Synopsis: Disconnects from storage subsystems on a remote computer.

Name: Update-Disk
Synopsis: Updates cached information about the specified Disk object only

Name: Update-HostStorageCache
Synopsis: Initiates an update on the host storage cache to reflect the current status of storage.

Name: Update-StorageFirmware
Synopsis: Updates the firmware on a storage device.

Name: Update-StoragePool
Synopsis: Updates the metadata of a Windows Server 2012 R2 storage pool.

Name: Update-StorageProviderCache
Synopsis: Updates the cache of the service for a particular provider and associated child objects.

Name: Write-VolumeCache
Synopsis: Writes the file system cache to disk.
